description: DevOps, platform engineering, and infrastructure fundamentals

nodes.name: Containers & Docker
nodes.description: Linux namespaces, cgroups, layers, image builds, multi-stage, security
challenge_hooks: What Linux kernel features make containers possible?
Why should you avoid running containers as root?
What's the difference between CMD and ENTRYPOINT in a Dockerfile?

nodes.name: Kubernetes
nodes.description: Pods, deployments, services, scheduling, resource limits, probes, RBAC
challenge_hooks: What is the difference between a liveness probe and a readiness probe?
Why does a pod with no resource limits harm other pods on the same node?
How does a Kubernetes service route traffic to pods?

nodes.name: CI/CD Pipelines
nodes.description: Build, test, deploy automation; trunk-based development; feature flags; deployment strategies
challenge_hooks: What is the difference between blue-green and canary deployments?
Why is trunk-based development preferred over long-lived feature branches?
At what point in a pipeline should security scanning occur?

nodes.name: Infrastructure as Code
nodes.description: Terraform, Pulumi, idempotency, state management, drift detection
challenge_hooks: What is Terraform state and why must it be stored remotely for teams?
What is infrastructure drift and how do you detect it?
When would you choose Pulumi over Terraform?

nodes.name: Observability & SRE
nodes.description: Metrics, logs, traces, alerting, SLOs, error budgets, incident response
challenge_hooks: What is an error budget and how do you use it to make deployment decisions?
What distinguishes a symptom-based alert from a cause-based alert?
Why should you alert on SLO burn rate rather than raw error rate?

nodes.name: Networking & DNS
nodes.description: TCP/IP, load balancers, ingress, service mesh, DNS resolution, TLS termination
challenge_hooks: What is the difference between L4 and L7 load balancing?
How does a service mesh handle mTLS between services?
What happens during a DNS resolution from browser to server?

nodes.name: Security & Secrets Management
nodes.description: Least privilege, secrets rotation, network policies, image scanning, SAST/DAST
challenge_hooks: Why should secrets never be baked into container images?
What is the principle of least privilege and how does it apply to k8s RBAC?
What's the difference between SAST and DAST?

nodes.name: GitOps
nodes.description: Git as single source of truth, reconciliation loops, ArgoCD, Flux
challenge_hooks: How does ArgoCD detect and correct drift?
What's the key difference between push-based and pull-based CD?
Why is GitOps considered more auditable than traditional CI/CD?
